statements: SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections;
SELECT applicant_id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, applicant_id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason = 'Insufficient Credit History';
SELECT applicant_id, application_date FROM credit_application_rejections ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason LIKE '%Income%';
SELECT id, applicant_id, application_date, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE applicant_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason LIKE '%income%' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT id, applicant_id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason IS NOT NULL AND application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason IN ('Credit score too low', 'Insufficient income') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rejections, MONTH(application_date) AS month FROM credit_application_rejections GROUP BY MONTH(application_date) ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT application_id, rejection_date, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT application_id, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections ORDER BY rejection_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason = 'Insufficient credit history';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, application_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections;
SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT rejection_reasons.reason_description, risk_assessment.risk_score FROM rejection_reasons JOIN risk_assessment ON rejection_reasons.reason_id = risk_assessment.rejection_id;
SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason, application_date FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_reason LIKE '%income%';
SELECT * FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_id = 1;
SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections WHERE rejection_id = 2;
SELECT application_date, rejection_reason FROM credit_application_rejections ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT rr.reason_description, car.applicant_name FROM credit_application_rejections car INNER JOIN rejection_reasons rr ON car.rejection_id = rr.reason_id;
SELECT car.applicant_name, ra.risk_score FROM credit_application_rejections car JOIN risk_assessment ra ON car.rejection_id = ra.rejection_id WHERE ra.risk_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM credit_applications
SELECT applicant_name, credit_score FROM credit_applications
SELECT MAX(credit_score) FROM credit_applications
SELECT applicant_name, address FROM applicants
SELECT rejection_reason, count(*) FROM credit_applications GROUP BY rejection_reason ORDER BY count(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM credit_applications WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY application_id DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM credit_applications JOIN rejection_reasons ON credit_applications.rejection_reason = rejection_reasons.reason_name WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT applicant_name, credit_score FROM credit_applications WHERE application_id IN (SELECT application_id FROM credit_scores WHERE score_date > '2022-01-01')
SELECT * FROM applicants JOIN credit_applications ON applicants.applicant_name = credit_applications.applicant_name ORDER BY applicants.applicant_id LIMIT 5
SELECT applicant_name, address, contact_number FROM applicants WHERE applicant_id = 3
SELECT * FROM credit_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM credit_applications;
SELECT reason_id, reason_text FROM rejection_reasons;
SELECT * FROM rejection_history WHERE rejected_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_email FROM applicant_details WHERE applicant_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM credit_applications
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM credit_applications WHERE id = 10
SELECT applicant_name, rejection_reason FROM credit_applications INNER JOIN rejection_history ON credit_applications.id = rejection_history.application_id
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, applicant_phone FROM credit_applications INNER JOIN applicant_details ON credit_applications.id = applicant_details.applicant_id

SELECT applicant_name, rejection_score, reason_text FROM credit_applications INNER JOIN rejection_analysis ON credit_applications.id = rejection_analysis.application_id INNER JOIN rejection_reasons ON rejection_analysis.rejection_score = rejection_reasons.reason_id
